Notes: GitHub repository contains both OpenAPI and AsyncAPI specifications
Direct spec: https://app.stainless.com/api/spec/documented/openai/openapi.documented.yml - Covers full OpenAI API including Whisper audio endpoints
Also available via Swagger UI at https://<region>.dev.cognitive.microsoft.com/docs/services/speech-to-text-api-v3-0
Google uses proprietary Discovery Document format instead of OpenAPI. Also available: v1 and v1p1beta1 versions
Repository also includes AsyncAPI spec and Postman collection
No public OpenAPI spec found. SDKs available at https://github.com/revdotcom but no formal API spec published
OpenAPI spec downloadable from their API documentation page - rendered via Redocly
AWS uses proprietary API definitions. No public OpenAPI spec. Use AWS SDKs or service documentation
Legacy service - OpenAPI 2.0 specs are deprecated and no longer maintained per IBM
Open-source toolkit - not a hosted API service. Requires self-hosting and custom implementation
